settings.title: Image with text overlay
settings.text: Use overlay text to give your customers insight into your brand. Select imagery and text that relates to your style and story.

settings.newsletter_form_heading: Be the first to know when we launch.

settings.content:
SAGA is a word of mouth brand. We built SAGA because we are passionate skiers and snowboarders who obsess over design, quality, and value. When we needed better fitting apparel and more rugged materials, we built it ourselves, by hand. When our small tribe of friends needed better gear, we ran exclusive manufacturing runs to sponsor them. When the public started demanding it, we sold limited edition quantities and built the first crowdsourced, direct-to-consumer model in our space. When our friends aspired to be the top professional athletes in our niche, we supported them, and built a brand around them. And they supported SAGA, trusting that together we were building a community, product and brand that was truly different and represented us. We built a cult of passionate people, from amateur thrill seekers, to pro athletes and everyday customers, just like we are. We pioneered what it meant to be a vertical brand in the digital realm.

We blur the lines between skier vs snowboarder, park vs big mountain, guy vs girl, kid vs adult, and retail vs direct-to-consumer. Our North Star is simple, to be the most connected brand and stand for our athletes and customers alike - the same since day one.

Stay Hungry.

settings.title: KEEP YOUR HEAD AND HANDS WARM

settings.benefit_copy: Stay up to date with the Saga Team all year long as they take us to new places and share their adventures.

settings.title: By Definition, a Saga is:
settings.text:
* A dramatic history of a group, place, industry

* Any very long story with dramatic events

From the very beginning Saga looked at the outerwear industry hill to climb as an exciting challenge. We broke into the outerwear industry because no other brands were providing products that fit the bodies and needs of the athletes we surrounded ourselves with.

We stood up against every other brand, small and large, and watched over the years as they came and went. But we stayed. We stayed because we believe in what the brand stands for and what the brand provides to the community and to you. We stayed because the community continued to support us.

Even after a year when our warehouse was broken into and hundreds of thousands of dollars of unreleased product was stolen from us, the community stuck with us and we survived.

Even after we were forced to reduce our staff to bare bones and move from our home in Salt Lake City to Boulder, Co, the community stuck with us and we survived.

And most recently when our entire staff was furloughed because of the Covid-19 pandemic and the brand went into âsleep modeâ, the community stuck with us.

This is our Saga, itâs truly never-ending. Our passion for snow and creating products to support your love of the slopes. We arenât going anywhere. Our passion for snow and your support for the brand continues to keep us going stronger than ever.
